product_name: AMC Quiet Water: New Hampshire and Vermont Canoe and Kayak Guide - 3rd Edtion
long_description: Quiet Water: New Hampshire and Vermont Canoe and Kayak Guide is great for canoeists and kayakers of all abilities, and features 95 trips that offer the best calm-water paddling in the region.
